name: Adventurous Customized and Exclusive Trips around the Philippines
description: It is exclusive and can be customized.it is more than 8 hours and can even be 24/7 if u decide to travel with us for days in distant places.We offer no limit of activities and places to explore everyday.it is flexible and can even adjust with your budget.and u will have 2 ladyguides to keep u company,take care of you and guide you for the fee of 1.
